overview: A downwards exploration of the sometimes destructive desire of individuals to challenge mediocrity and break free from it. It is based on photographs the artistâ€™s grandfather made when he was fighting as a voluntary member of the fascist militia in Ethiopia in 1935-36. A rendition of the delirious memories of a terminally ill man in his failed attempt to rationalise an unfulfilled thirst for transcendence.
title: The Silent Ray
